thread.title: Financial Judgment Recovery Launch A No Fee Solution For Court Awarded Judgment
thread.title_full: Financial Judgment Recovery Launch A No Fee Solution For Court Awarded Judgment

author: prbuzz.com
title: Financial Judgment Recovery Launch A No Fee Solution For Court Awarded Judgment
text:
A service that allows a plaintiff to receive the money owed by a debt without incurring any charges has been launched.
When a court awards a judgment to the plaintiff it does not guarantee payment will be made. Collecting a debt awarded by the courts can become a huge and expensive problem. That is why Financial Judgment Recovery has launched a debt recovery service that will not incur any charges for the Plaintiff.
Financial Judgment Recovery provides a service where they will collect the debt no matter if the debtor has moved to a new state. They purchase the debt from the plaintiff in its entirety, releasing the stress and the cost of chasing the debt for money owed.
This debt recovery service by Financial Judgment Recovery allows the plaintiff to receive the money owed without delay. For more details, please visit http://fjrecovery.com/
Media Contact
